flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Legends claim this
POKMON flies the
world's skies con tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

A legend says that
its body glows in
seven colors. A rainbow is said to
form behind it
when it flies.

It will reveal
itself before a
pure-hearted trainer by shining
its bright rain
bow-colored wings.

HO-OHs feathers glow in seven colors
depending on the angle at which they
are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring
happiness to the bearers. This POKMON
is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

HO-OHs feathers glow in seven colors
depending on the angle at which they
are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring
happiness to the bearers. This POKMON
is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

Its feathers--which glow in seven colors
depending on the angle at which they are
struck by light--are thought to bring joy.
It is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

A legend says that its body glows in
seven colors. A rainbow is said to form
behind it when it flies.

Legends claim this POKMON flies the
worlds skies continuously on its
magnificent seven-colored wings.

Its feathers are in seven colors.
It is said that anyone seeing it is
promised eternal happiness.

Its feathers are in seven colors.
It is said that anyone seeing it is
promised eternal happiness.

Its feathers are in seven colors.
It is said that anyone seeing it is
promised eternal happiness.

Legends claim this Pokmon flies the
worlds skies continuously on its
magnificent, seven-colored wings.

A legend says that its body glows in
seven colors. A rainbow is said to
form behind it when it flies.

Ses plumes possdent sept couleurs.
On prtend que sa vue apporte la
joie ternelle.

Its feathers are in seven colors.
It is said that anyone seeing it is
promised eternal happiness.

Its feathers are in seven colors.
It is said that anyone seeing it is
promised eternal happiness.

Son corps brille des sept couleurs de larc-en-ciel,
arc-en-ciel qui se constitue derrire lui quand il vole.

Sein Krper soll in sieben Farben leuchten. Im Flug
zieht es einen Regenbogen hinter sich her.

Cuenta la leyenda que brilla en siete colores. Dicen
que deja un arcoris tras de s al volar.

Narra la leggenda che il suo corpo brilli di sette
colori. Volando lascia un arcobaleno dietro di s.

A legend says that its body glows in seven colors.
A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.

Il ne se montre qu un Dresseur au cur pur en
dvoilant ses magnifiques ailes colores.

Es wird sich dem Trainer offenbaren, der reinen
Herzens ist, und ihm seine bunten Schwingen zeigen.

Se revelar ante Entrenadores de corazn puro
mostrando sus brillantes alas arcoris.

Pu mostrarsi a un Allenatore puro di cuore spiegando
le ali, che hanno i colori dellarcobaleno.

It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by
shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.

Les plumes de Ho-Oh brillent de sept couleurs selon
lorientation de son corps par rapport  la lumire.
On raconte que ces plumes portent bonheur. On dit
aussi que ce Pokmon vit au pied dun arc-en-ciel.

Ho-Ohs Federn leuchten in sieben Farben, je nachdem aus
welchem Winkel das Licht auf sie fllt. Die Federn sollen ihrem
Besitzer Glck bringen. Dieses Pokmon lebt am Fue eines
Regenbogens.

El plumaje de Ho-Oh contiene siete colores que pueden
apreciarse segn el ngulo desde el que les d la luz. Dicen
que sus plumas dan felicidad a quienes las llevan y, tambin,
que este Pokmon vive a los pies del arco iris.

Il piumaggio di Ho-Oh brilla in sette colori a seconda
dellangolazione dei raggi luminosi. Si dice che le sue
piume portino felicit a chi le possiede. Si narra che viva
ai piedi di un arcobaleno.

Ho-Ohs feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle
at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to
bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokmon is said to live at
the foot of a rainbow.
